description.narrative: At the end of 2017, in the targeted areas, at least 50% of communities experiencing violence, abuse and exploitation against girls and boys, strengthen their capacity to prevent, respond and undertake actions to abandon those practices (with particular attention to FGM /E and early marriage and forced pregnancies and birth registration) and the ability of boys and girls to claim and exercise their rights has increased, including in emergency situations.

mailing-address.narrative: Corniche Nord Immeuble Saadi Quartier Camayenne Conakry P. O. Box 222 - Conakry

sector.narrative: Child protection focused on care and support for children with disabilities
Community and home based maternal and newborn care
ECD data, evidence, and knowledge generation and dissemination
Parent/caregiver education and programmes on violence, exploitation and abuse - across the life cycle
Public finance management for child protection
Social and behaviour change communication related to FGM/C
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: At the end of 2017, in the targeted areas, at least 50% of communities experiencing violence, abuse and exploitation against girls and boys, strengthen their capacity to prevent, respond and undertake actions to abandon those practices (with particular attention to FGM /E and early marriage and forced pregnancies and birth registration) and the ability of boys and girls to claim and exercise their rights has increased, including in emergency situations.

description.narrative: In 2017, UNICEF and counterparts placed great emphasis on the prevention of violence, abuse and exploitation of children. The focus was capacity building for children on how to protect themselves and their siblings from violence abuse and exploitation, and in particular from female genital mutilation and on child marriage | Status:On-track | As-of Date:13/12/2017
